```{r}
jpe_data_preliminary <-
  calculate_jpe_data(
    JPI = 278448,
    V.JPI = 280340342,
    timing = "Preliminary"
  )

jpe_data_final <-
  calculate_jpe_data(
    JPI = 311058,
    V.JPI = 452638929,
    timing = "Final"
  )

jpe_data_preliminary |>
  bind_rows(jpe_data_final) |>
  pivot_wider(
    id_cols = Variable,
    names_from = timing,
    values_from = value
  ) |>
  filter(Variable %in% c(
    "f.hat",
    "natural surv rate",
    "JPI",
    "JPE",
    "JPE lower 95% CI",
    "JPE upper 95% CI"
  )) |>
  # slice(2, 1, 3, 4, 5) |> # Change if you want to reorder rows
  noaa_table() |>
  colformat_double(i = c(1, 4, 5, 6),
                   j = c(2, 3),
                   digits = 0)
```


## VWM survival and natural-origin JPE

### Preliminary estimate

```{r}
jpe_data_preliminary |>
  select(-timing) |>
  rename(`Preliminary Value` = value) |> 
  noaa_table()
```


### Final estimate

```{r}
jpe_data_final |>
  select(-timing) |>
  rename(`Final Value` = value) |> 
  noaa_table()
```


## Exploration of survival by year

```{r}
survival_by_year_tidy <-
  survival_by_year |>
  pivot_longer(cols = -year) |>
  separate_wider_delim(
    name,
    delim = ".",
    names = c(
      "measure",
      "location",
      "region"
    )
  ) |>
  filter(measure != "SE") |>
  mutate(location = str_to_title(location)) |>
  mutate(year = as.character(year))
```


```{r}
#| fig-height: 7
survival_by_year_tidy |>
  ggplot(aes(
    x = year,
    y = value,
    group = location
  )) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_y_continuous(
    labels = percent_format()
  ) +
  facet_wrap(
    vars(location),
    ncol = 1
  ) +
  labs(title = "Survival Rate by Location") +
  theme_minimal(
    base_family = "Arial",
    base_size = 12
  ) +
  theme(
    axis.title = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
    plot.title = element_text(
      size = 16,
      face = "bold"
    ),
    plot.title.position = "plot",
    panel.spacing = unit(50, "pt"),
    strip.text = element_text(
      hjust = 0,
      size = 12
    )
  )
```
